developers.description: I am MrBeeBenson, I am the current Project Lead and founder of Rolling Rhino Remix. I coordinate the development within the project as well as take user feedback and work on updates.

contributors.name: TheOceanBreeze
contributors.description: Submitted a patch to rhino-update to reword the prompt in rhino-update. Removed `sudo snap refresh` from rhino-update.

contributors.name: Kreblskulm
contributors.description: Added a feature to rhino-update to ensure that the same kernel version is not reinstalled multiple times.
